SEARCH
Package datastructure

Class MusialStorage

java.lang.Object
datastructure.InfoContainer
datastructure.MusialStorage
public class MusialStorage extends InfoContainer
Main data structure to store information about variants wrt. features and samples.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    final HashMap<String,HashMap<Integer,HashSet<String>>>
    excludedVariants
    Specification of positions and explicit variants to exclude from the analysis per reference contig.
    final MusialStorageParameters
    parameters
    Set of parameters used for filtering variant calls.

  • Field Details

    • parameters

      public final MusialStorageParameters parameters
      Set of parameters used for filtering variant calls.

    • excludedVariants

      public final HashMap<String,HashMap<Integer,HashSet<String>>> excludedVariants
      Specification of positions and explicit variants to exclude from the analysis per reference contig.

  • Constructor Details

    • MusialStorage

      public MusialStorage(htsjdk.samtools.reference.IndexedFastaSequenceFile reference, Double minimalCoverage, Double minimalFrequency)
      Constructor of MusialStorage.
      Parameters:
      reference - IndexedFastaSequenceFile to use as the reference (sequence).
      minimalCoverage - Double; Minimal read coverage to use for allele filtering.
      minimalFrequency - Double; Minimal allele frequency to use for allele filtering.

    • MusialStorage

      public MusialStorage(htsjdk.samtools.reference.IndexedFastaSequenceFile reference, Double minimalCoverage, Double minimalFrequency, Collection<Feature> features, Collection<Sample> samples, HashMap<String,TreeSet<Integer>> excludedPositions, HashMap<String,HashMap<Integer,HashSet<String>>> excludedVariants) throws MusialException
      Constructor of MusialStorage.
      Parameters:
      reference - IndexedFastaSequenceFile to use as the reference (sequence).
      minimalCoverage - Double; Minimal read coverage to use for allele filtering.
      minimalFrequency - Double; Minimal allele frequency to use for allele filtering.
      features - Collection of Features.
      samples - Collection of Samples.
      excludedPositions - HashMap specifying positions to exclude from the analysis.
      excludedVariants - HashMap specifying variants to exclude from the analysis.
      Throws:
      MusialException - See Sample.imputeVcfFileReader().

  • Method Details

    • setReference

      public void setReference(htsjdk.samtools.reference.IndexedFastaSequenceFile reference)
      Sets the reference sequence associated with this instance to the passed indexed reference feature file.
      Parameters:
      reference - Instance of IndexedFastaSequenceFile.

    • isPositionExcluded

      public boolean isPositionExcluded(String contig, int position)
      Checks whether position is excluded on contig of reference.
      Parameters:
      contig - Contig (name) to check fo exclusion.
      position - Position to check for exclusion.
      Returns:
      True if position on feature featureName is excluded from the analysis.

    • isVariantExcluded

      public boolean isVariantExcluded(String contig, int position, String variant)
      Checks whether variant at position is excluded on contig of reference.
      Parameters:
      contig - Contig (name) to check fo exclusion.
      position - Position to check for exclusion.
      variant - Variant to check for exclusion.
      Returns:
      True if variant at position on feature featureName is excluded from the analysis.

    • addFeature

      public void addFeature(Feature feature)
      Add an entry to this features. Existing entries will be overwritten. The Feature.name value will be used as key.
      Parameters:
      feature - Entry to add.

    • getFeature

      public Feature getFeature(String name)
      Getter method for features.
      Parameters:
      name - Name of the feature to query.
      Returns:
      The queried feature or null, if no feature is stored at key name.

    • hasFeature

      public boolean hasFeature(String name)
      Query whether a feature is stored in this instance by its name.
      Parameters:
      name - Name of the feature to query.
      Returns:
      Whether the queried feature is present in this instance.

    • getFeatureNameIterator

      public Iterator<String> getFeatureNameIterator()
      Returns:
      String iterator over the key set of features.

    • getFeatureNameIterator

      public Iterator<String> getFeatureNameIterator(int position)
      Parameters:
      position - The position to restrict features to.
      Returns:
      String iterator over the key set of features covering the specified position.

    • getReferenceSequenceOfFeature

      public String getReferenceSequenceOfFeature(String featureName)
      Constructs the base sequence of the specified feature wrt. reference.
      Parameters:
      featureName - The name of the feature to query.
      Returns:
      The base sequence of the specified feature or null if the feature does not exist.

    • removeFeature

      public void removeFeature(String featureName)
      Removes a feature from the currently stored features.
      Parameters:
      featureName - The name of the feature to remove.

    • addSample

      public void addSample(Sample sample)
      Add an entry to this samples. Existing entries will be overwritten. The Sample.name value will be used as key.
      Parameters:
      sample - Entry to add.

    • getSample

      public Sample getSample(String name)
      Getter method for samples.
      Parameters:
      name - Name of the sample to query.
      Returns:
      The queried sample or null, if no feature is stored at key name.

    • hasSample

      public boolean hasSample(String name)
      Query whether a sample is stored in this instance by its name.
      Parameters:
      name - Name of the sample to query.
      Returns:
      Whether the queried sample is present in this instance.

    • getSampleNameIterator

      public Iterator<String> getSampleNameIterator()
      Returns:
      String iterator over the key set of samples.

    • getNumberOfSamples

      public int getNumberOfSamples()
      Getter method for samples size.
      Returns:
      The number of entries stored in samples.

    • dump

      public void dump(String path, boolean compress) throws MusialException
      Dumps this MusialStorage instance into a .json(.gz) format file. The output is optionally compressed with gzip.
      Parameters:
      path - String specifying file path to which MusialStorage should be written to.
      compress - Boolean indicating whether the output file should be compressed.
      Throws:
      MusialException - If the output generation fails.

    • toVcf

      public String toVcf()
      Constructs a dummy vcf file from all variants stored in this instance.
      Returns:
      The dummy vcf file content.

    • getFormName

      public String getFormName(int hashKey, String value)
      Used to collide form names based on mapping stored in formNameCodes.

      Specifically, this is used to map hash keys of variant fingerprints (see Form.variants) to human-readable names.

      Parameters:
      hashKey - Key to store.
      value - Value to store.
      Returns:
      Returns value or the value stored at hashKey, if present.
